hero_title: Clean, pro installs — we come to you.
hero_sub: Dashcams, reverse cams, LED footwells, RGB head/taillights. Hidden wiring. Battery-safe hardwires. Same‑day slots.

services.title: Standard Dashcam Install
services.desc: Single or dual dashcam, tidy hidden wiring, basic setup.

services.title: Dashcam + Reverse + hardwire kit
services.desc: Reverse cam on trunk/plate and battery‑safe hardwire.

services.title: LED Footwells (Sedan)
services.desc: All four footwells. Includes parts and clean controller placement.

services.title: RGB Headlights & Taillights
services.desc: Controller wiring, fuse tap & testing, app pairing.

reviews.text: Dashcam install looks factory. He came to my driveway and cleaned up after. 10/10.
